overview: Following in the Extra Terrestrial's footsteps, the QT wants to go home.  'My Queer Samsara is a critical look at a constructed social identity that hides underneath it a gnawing want; a need to 'go back home' and be fully accepted into the bosom of our very first loves, the ones who were supposed to take care of us, our families.'
title: My Queer Samsara
